reviewText: This video does a great job of exposing big Pharma and alternative methods of fighting cancer.

I did not finish it yet, but I wonder why I get this feeling that I just paid to watch an infomercial for "Ultra Life".

I posted only 3 pictures from the video, but there are more. I just didn't have the patience to go back through the video to check.
Five people with cancer or lyme disease are interviewed on this video, along with a doctor who treats cancer patients holistically.  What a refreshing look at a disease that affects so many

Forty  year  war  on Cancer  is  so pointless!  Cancer  is not a  disease (by Andreas Moritz -check amazon)  So there  is no  cure never  was and  never will be found.  So  sad!  millions  needless  deaths from  a  non disease  and  we don't  'get it'

If you go to the doctor and are told, "you have cancer" there is only one path a dr. will take you down. Chemotherapy. A procedure that kills every healthy cell in your body! Why, when you're fighting for your life, would you want to completely destroy your immune system?!? Documentaries like this one, The Beautiful Truth, Healing Cancer From Inside Out, etc. are shining a light on America's corrupt, money machine, cancer fighting system (owned by the Rockafellers)and the other treatments people can can find if they only choose to seek them. I loved this documentary and highly recommend it to everyone
I believe every expereince that each patient had were true.  I also believe that we are born with a perfect body and that we harm our body by not taking care of it. S. Jackson
